home.title: AUTOMATIC PEST MONITORING
home.subtitle: Our traps can monitor all types of insects on your farm.

main.title: Traps
main.description-first: Insects, disease and weather challenges can cost a lot of work and revenue. With Phosphorland traps, you can protect your crops and investments.
main.description-second: Our Smart Traps are an automated system for monitoring insects, attracted to them. It works in all areas covered by GPRS, 3G or LTE network. The system consists of fully integrated, automated and easy-to-use tools.

item.1: Greater monitoring accuracy at a lower cost
item.2: Fewer field visits and more efficient pest control
item.3: Optimization in the application of pesticides
item.4: Near real-time insight into a pest attack
item.5: Data sharing made easy with Eng. Agronomist

main.description-third: The system provides near real-time indications of pest occurrences. Improved monitoring accuracy will significantly increase the quality and feasibility of your decision making.

1.title: Trap
1.description: Energy independent and weather resistant pheromone traps capture and send pictures of attracted pests

2.title: Application
2.description: Our mobile application allows you to efficiently monitor and successfully respond to every situation on the field

3.title: Communication
3.description: All data and photographs of your traps are securely archived and accessible through your mobile phone

4.title: Durability
4.description: Durable, light and weather resistant system that will withstand any conditions

5.title: Format
5.description: Standard format boxes capture pests efficiently

6.title: Photographs
6.description: Access to high resolution images of the insects caught in the trap

7.title: Meterology
7.description: Integrated local weather data for pest prediction and easier decision making
